name: NoMad (itch) (Tijn Arts)
description:
Made for the 7 Day Roguelike gamejam

Get rid of the monsters in the old and abandoned settlements in the Mongolian desert. Level up and gain strength to beat the increasingly difficult monsters.

How To Play:

Move: WASD or ARROW-KEYS

Interact: SPACE or RETURN

  • Walk into an enemy to attack it.
  • Your level is your maximum damage
  • If your minimum damage is higher than 0, you'll never miss
  • Every time you attack an enemy (hit or miss) you'll gain XP
  • After leaving an area you cannot return (so level up as much as you can!)
